mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptedPwd() */ A.PASSWORD FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.ENT_YN = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT /* com.qs.www.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.PASSWORD , A.NAME , A.RRN , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.ENT_YN , A.EMAIL , A.BIRTHDAY , A.ADDRESS , A.GENDER , A.PHONE , A.QUESTION_CODE , B.QUESTION_BODY , A.QUESTION_ANSWER , A.DOMITORY_YN , A.ROLE_CODE , C.ROLE_NAME , A.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME , D.DEPT_CALL_NUMBER , A.JOB_CODE , E.JOB_NAME , A.APP_WORK_TYPE , A.WORK_CODE , A.REMAINING_HOLIDAY FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_CHECK_QUESTION B ON (A.QUESTION_CODE = B.QUESTION_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE C ON (A.ROLE_CODE = C.ROLE_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON (A.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB E ON (A.JOB_CODE = E.JOB_CODE) WHERE A.ENT_YN = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectQuestionCode() */ A.QUESTION_CODE FROM TBL_CHECK_QUESTION A WHERE A.QUESTION_BODY = #{ questionBody }
